CN.content:

Paragraph: This arises from the result of a decrease in the contents of high electron affinity DTBT units as the number of perylene units in the polymers increased.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

2. Perylene (presumably a chemical compound)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| DTBT |
| Perylene |

These two entities clearly refer to the value of material properties, specifically the decrease in the contents of high electron affinity DTBT units and the increase in the number of perylene units in the polymers.
